# The Emerald Semaphore of Keta-9

> Wiki about **The Emerald Semaphore of Keta-9** : a 2024 science-fantasy / neo-noir feature film written and directed by **Mira Halvorsen** and produced by Glassloop Atelier.

[Production](production)
[Awards](awards)
